snippet: Edward T. Mechmann, who oversees child protection programs in the Archdiocese of New York, responds to an online Retro Report.
lead_paragraph: Edward T. Mechmann, who oversees child protection programs in the Archdiocese of New York, responds to an online Retro Report.

headline.main: The Church’s Efforts to Prevent Future Child Abuse
headline.print_headline: The Church’s Efforts to Prevent Future Child Abuse
